::KitKat::

She was working on Megatron's clone.  It was now 50% complete.  She 
smiled at her work.  This would give her an edge later on.

She got the message from Famine. "Yes Famine. You may take what you 
need. Tell Destrunctor that I will need to speak to him later on when 
he gets achance. Be careful out there Famine.  I don't want to loose 
my best warriors to bunch of maximals."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Famine arrived at the base.  He had to hurry. He first opened a 
comm to 
> Sphink with the instructions to come back to the ark with some 
tools and 
> supplies. Then he made another comm to Kit Kat. "My leader the 
situation at 
> the ark has calmed down. They wish us to lend some tools or 
supplies that we 
> can spare. Destructor told me of a room which holds such things. Do 
I have 
> your permission to proceed?"
